trans-unit.source: Provides a visual editor to edit <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> objects, and provides an area for the user to drag and drop, and otherwise edit composed elements.
trans-unit.target: 提供 visual 的编辑器来编辑<xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref>对象，并提供一个供用户拖放，，否则编辑由的元素的区域。

trans-unit.source: This is a WPF control that acts as an editing container that displays the visualization for the data it is bound to in the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个充当编辑容器显示绑定到中的数据的可视化效果的 WPF 控件<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item%2A>属性。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowItemPresenter is one of two controls (the other being <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter>) that can be used to create a container for visualizing and editing a composed element.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowItemPresenter 是两个控件之一 (另一个执行<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter>) 可用来创建可视化和编辑对组合的元素的容器。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the visualization of the composed element is not controlled by the WorkflowItemPresenter but it renders with the visualization associated in the metadata store for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 请务必注意，组合的元素的可视化不由 WorkflowItemPresenter 控制，但与给定类型的元数据存储关联的可视化呈现。

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowItemPresenter is a specialized subclass of the [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/add/includes/avalon1-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> that has been modified to support drag and drop, copy and paste, and other visual editing actions.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowItemPresenter 是一个专门的子类的[!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/add/includes/avalon1-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>它已经过修改以支持拖动并放置、 复制和粘贴和其他可视化编辑操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllowedItemType" name="AllowedItemType" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_AllowedItemType" name="AllowedItemType" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> disallows dropping objects that do not conform to the `Type`.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter>不允许删除对象，不符合`Type`。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""></xref> that contains the allowed item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""> </xref>包含允许的项。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.AllowedItemType*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the string that contains the hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含的提示文本的字符串<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.HintText*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this is the default container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示这是否为默认容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is the default container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果这是默认容器中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.IsDefaultContainer*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the current item of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的当前项<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref> control.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.Item*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可粘贴指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: A list of items to be pasted.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified objects can be pasted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可粘贴指定的对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成移动指定的项的移动操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The item to move.
Invoked after the start of a copy operation to complete the copying of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 复制操作以完成复制指定的项的开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to copy.
The items cloned from the specified items.
Invoked after the start of a cut operation to complete the cutting of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成剪切指定项的剪切操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to cut.
The items cloned from the specified items.
Invoked after the start of a delete operation to complete the deletion of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成删除指定项的删除操作开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to delete.
Invoked after the start of a paste operation to complete the pasting of the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 在粘贴操作以完成指定的项粘贴开始后调用。

trans-unit.source: The items to paste.
The metadata associated with the items to paste.
trans-unit.target: 与要粘贴的项关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The location where to paste the items.
A reference to the paste location.
